trusted_proxies_configuration.title: Configure Trusted Proxies
trusted_proxies_configuration.description:
To allow remote access via the OpenEnergy tunnel, you must configure 'trusted_proxies' in your configuration.yaml.

Add '127.0.0.1' and '::1' to the 'http' -> 'trusted_proxies' list and enable 'use_x_forwarded_for'. See the documentation link for details.
